name: Commando Shooter- Critical Ops
description:
Fight for your honor! Join now epic, explosive strategy shooting game. Elaborate the perfect strategy with your teammates and take on legions of commanders from all over the world. The destiny of your alliance depends on you. Download now the best shooting game for free!

Boasting spectacular graphics and blistering action sequences, Gameloft’s powerhouse sequel is a worthy alternative to console-based first-person shooters. The fifth installment in this popular series offers a thrilling single-player campaign that takes you from Venice waterways to downtown Tokyo.

Commando Shooting - Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

We are constantly updating the game to fix bugs, improve optimisation and add a ton of new features and content to the game!
